

TILE AREA SELECTION

1.  Center the map view around the place of interest. Optionally, you can run a Nominatim search
    by clicking the 'Search' button .
2.  Adjust the window size to enclose the entire area you want to download.
3.  Set the desired zoom factor to be retrieved (it will not chenge the current map view zoom
4.  The count of estimated number of tiles to download will automaticallly update.
5.  Select the desired map style among the ones available. Please note that for other styles than Mapnik you will need
    an API key from thunderforest.com (free plans available, allowing download of 150K tiles per mont)
6.  Press OK to confirm the download parameters (area, style and zoom factor)
